title: Autonomous Picosecond-Precision Synchronization in Measurement-Device-Independent Quantum Key Distribution
summary: Measurement-device-independent quantum key distribution (MDI-QKD) eliminates detector side-channel attacks by relocating all measurements to an untrusted intermediate node. However, its practical implementation critically relies on picosecond-level temporal synchronization between spatially separated users.
